name: OSIRIS
description: Dark history about OSIRIS corporation, which perform experiments in the field of teleportation of human souls to the Heaven on the artificial planet G6. Inspired by Dark Dubstep music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 3825U 1.9GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 920M 1GB Storage: 1100 MB available space Additional Notes: If you could launch the game on older machines, please, contact with me - and I update Minimum System Requirements. Если Вы смогли запустить игру на более старых машинах, пожалуйста, свяжитесь со мной - я обновлю Минимальные Системные Требования
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: QuadCore AMD A8-5600K 3.6GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7950 3GB Storage: 1100 MB available space
